sources.title: Thanks for the Memory (1938)
sources.description: Steve Merrick is an out of work writer who stays home and plays house husband while his wife goes to work for her former fiancé and Merrick's publisher who is still carrying a torch for her. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/thanks-for-the-memory-1938/

metadata.Plot: Bob Hope is an out of work writer who stays home and plays house husband while his wife goes to work for her former fiancé and Hope's publisher who is still carrying a torch for her.
metadata.Writer: Lynn Starling, Albert Hackett, Frances Goodrich
metadata.Actors: Bob Hope, Shirley Ross, Charles Butterworth
